page.title: 04Travel from Plympton
page.content: You can get to London from Plymouth by train, plane, car and coach. To go by train would cost Â£20 for a ticket. The cost of a ticket to travel by plane would be Â£92 return. Planes fly from Plymouth to Newquay then onto London Heathrow. The planes fly four times a day and it takes about 1.5hrs to fly to London. A car would take four hrs, as would a coach. I would prefer to fly to London. If you want to travel from Plympton to Plymouth today you can do it quite easily. You hop into a car and zoom away. You can get to Plymouth using a car, bicycle, bus or coach. There are two bus services that go to Plymouth. These are the number 20 and 21. It will cost 35p for a single childs fare to Plymouth. Alastair Mullan and Alan Smale
